definitions.definition: A being such as a monotheistic God: a single divine creator and ruler of the universe.
The single deity of various monotheistic religions, especially the deity of Judaism, Christianity, and Islam.
definitions.example: Dawn believes in God, but Willow believes in multiple gods and goddesses.

definitions.definition: The single male deity of various bitheistic or duotheistic religions.
A deity or supreme being; a supernatural, typically immortal, being with superior powers, to which personhood is attributed.
definitions.example: The most frequently used name for the Islamic god is Allah.

definitions.definition: A person in a high position of authority, importance or influence.

definitions.example: Lounging on the beach were several Greek gods.

definitions.definition: The person who owns and runs a multi-user dungeon.
